text:
Maciej Parowski (27 December 1946 – 2 June 2019) was a Polish journalist, essayist, science fiction writer, editor and translator. She was born in Warsaw. He worked as a critic of science-fiction. He was Chief editor of "Nowa Fantastyka" from 1992 to 2003. He also wrote the comics: "Funky Koval" and "Wiedźmin".
Parowski died on 2 June 2019 in Warsaw at the age of 72.
